attributes.action: put black covers over pornographic magazines and "lad's mags" in newspaper shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I go to the corner shop I don't want to be confronted by pornographic images (often uncensored). It's not pleasant, and it's totally unnecessary. Children go into these shops, and allowing them to see foul language and pornography is not acceptable. If people want to buy these magazines they may, but it is unfair to inflict these images on the rest of us.
